item.title: Hamas says it agrees to release Israeli hostages but seeks changes to US Gaza peace plan
item.description: The 20-point proposal seeks to end the fighting immediately in return for the release of hostages and detained Gazans.

item.title: Four killed in latest US strike on alleged drug vessel near Venezuela
item.description: Donald Trump says the boat was carrying enough drugs to kill thousands of people.

item.title: Conservative church group condemns choice of female Archbishop of Canterbury
item.description: The group, Gafcon, says that its followers believe "the Bible requires a male-only episcopacy".

item.title: Massive fire at Chevron refinery in California contained, officials say
item.description: The cause of the explosion and blaze at the El Segundo refinery, Chevron's second largest in the US, remains under investigation.

item.title: Behind the Gen Z protesters who want to force Madagascar's president from power
item.description: President Rajoelina's move fails to quell the protest movement that is now threatening his own position.
